pr_title: KEYCLOAK-13698 - SAML Client - Add certificate info to signature

timeline.message:
Fix KEYCLOAK-13698 - Add certificate info to signature

Adds the X509Data tag to the XML Document signature in AuthnRequests

Fix KEYCLOAK-13698 - Add certificate info to signature

Adds the X509Data tag to the XML Document signature in AuthnRequests

Fix KEYCLOAK-13698 - Add certificate info to signature

Adds the X509Data tag to the XML Document signature in AuthnRequests

timeline.bodyText: Changing this method signature leads to many unnecessary changes. There is no need to do so, please revert, as well as related changes in the testsuite. Feel free to create a overloaded version of this method with this signature, but retain the previous version.
timeline.author: hmlnarik

replies.bodyText:
Thanks for your review! I reverted the unnecessary changes you pointed out and pushed two separate commits, the first with the bare minimum issue fix, the related test and the correct commit message, and a second one that adds the ability to specify the certificate to be used in AuthnRequest/LogoutRequest tests.
Please let me know if they are both good and I'll squash the commits, but if you prefer not touching the other test files I will just revert the second one.
replies.author: lscorcia
